alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Polk and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lakeland to 9 miles northwest of Wauchula. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Bartow, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Fussels Corner, Jan Phyl Village, Fort Meade, Mulberry, Bradley Junction, Homeland, Alafia River State Park, Highland City, Fort Lonesome, Plant City Airport, Crystal Lake, Lakeland Highlands, Willow Oak, and Winston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
